title: Buttery Nipple Gourmet Pudding Shots
directions: Stir milk, schnapps, Irish cream liqueur, vodka, and coffee-flavored liqueur together in a bowl. Add pudding mix and blend thoroughly. Spoon into disposable shot cups and refrigerate until chilled, at least 30 minutes.
ingredients: 2 fluid ounces Irish cream liqueur (such as Bailey's)
1 fluid ounce coffee-flavored liqueur (such as Kahlua)
1 (3.4 ounce) package instant butterscotch pudding mix
